abstract: New York Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo may demand the return of $4 billion in bonuses paid by Merrill Lynch just before it was acquired by Bank of America, Bloomberg News reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.
lead_paragraph: New York Attorney General Andrew M. Cuomo may demand the return of $4 billion in bonuses paid by Merrill Lynch just before it was acquired by Bank of America, Bloomberg News reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Cuomo May Seek Return of Early Merrill Bonuses, Report Says
